section.name: Usertype
section.p: User Types and classes for use with Hibernate. Includes user types for use with many types including the javax.time classes included in the early review draft of JSR 310 as well as for Joda Time and Joda Money. Where possible these types are compatible with the equivalent "Joda Time Contrib - Hibernate user types".

section.name: Bindings
section.p: Bindings is a library supporting a variety of methods for defining bindings between classes and their String representation

section.name: Cloning
section.p: Cloning provides fast deep cloning capabilities for almost any Java object.

section.name: CDT
section.p: CDT provides common data types for commonly used types such as ISO Country Codes, Phone Numbers and other types.

section.name: Quant
section.p: Quant provides classes implementing common quantitative functions.

section.name: Scanner
section.p: Scanner provides capability for scanning the classpath without loading classes.
